entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Stratford
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 8:46 PM EST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Cloudy, -2.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: London Int'l Airport 02:00 AM EST Sunday 29 January 2023
Condition: Cloudy
Temperature: -2.7°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.9 kPa falling
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 82 %
Wind Chill: -8
Dewpoint: -5.4°C
Wind: E 18 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy this evening then periods of snow. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind becoming east 20 km/h after midnight. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 11 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Periods of snow. High zero.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending in the afternoon then cloudy. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High zero. Wind chill minus 7 in the morning. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 7 in the evening and minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Saturday 28 January 2023
